DD_Class.definition: The LED_Illumination_Source class provides attributes describing an individual LED used to illuminate an imaging target.

DD_Class.name: Image_Compression_Segment
DD_Class.definition: The Image_Compression_Segment class provides attributes describing each segment into which data was partitioned for error containment purposes as part of the compression process.

DD_Class.name: Instrument_State
DD_Class.definition: The Instrument_State class contains classes providing the values of any dynamic physical or operating characteristics of the imaging instruments.

DD_Class.name: JPEG_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The JPEG_Parameters class contains attributes describing onboard compression parameters specific to Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG) image compression.

DD_Class.name: JPEG_Progressive_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The JPEG_Progressive_Parameters class contains attributes describing an interlaced progressive JPEG format, in which data is compressed in multiple passes of progressively higher detail. This is ideal for large images that will be displayed while downloading over a slow connection, allowing a reasonable preview after receiving only a portion of the data.

DD_Class.name: List_Index_No_Units_Imaging
DD_Class.definition: Used when the list values have no units.

DD_Class.name: LOCO_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The LOCO_Parameters class contains attributes describing onboard compression parameters specific to Low Complexity Lossless Compression (LOCO) image compression, a lossless submode of ICER

DD_Class.name: Onboard_Color_Matrix
DD_Class.definition: The Onboard_Color_Matrix class represents a 3x3 matrix that is used onboard to perform color correction. It is done after de-Bayering, as all three color bands are needed for each pixel. The first three elements are multiplied by the R,G,B (respectively) pixel values and summed to get the output Red pixel value. Similarly, the second three create the output Green, and the last three the output Blue. If the label is not present, no correction was performed.

DD_Class.name: Onboard_Responsivity
DD_Class.definition: The Onboard_Responsivity class specifies factors that have been applied to the R, G, and B cells (respectively) of the Bayer pattern, before de-Bayering (demosaicking) takes place. The intent of these is to approximately balance the filters so the de-Bayering process is not skewed, and EDR/ILT products look reasonable before full radiometric or color correction is done on the ground. If these factors are not present, no correction was performed.

DD_Class.name: Optical_Properties
DD_Class.definition: The Optical_Properties class describes properties of the optics used in acquiring the image.

DD_Class.name: Pixel_Averaging_Dimensions
DD_Class.definition: The Pixel_Averaging_Dimensions class provides the height and width, in pixels, of the area over which pixels were averaged prior to image compression.

DD_Class.name: Pointing_Correction
DD_Class.definition: The Pointing_Correction class contains attributes used to identify and describe the camera model transformations completed in order to update pointing information of an image or mosaic.

DD_Class.name: Pointing_Correction_File
DD_Class.definition: The Pointing_Correction_File class identifies a file containing pointing correction information.

DD_Class.name: Pointing_Correction_Image
DD_Class.definition: The Pointing_Correction_Image class contains attributes used to identify and describe the camera model transformations completed in order to update pointing information of a single image, whether alone or part of a mosaic.

DD_Class.name: Pointing_Model_Parameter
DD_Class.definition: The Pointing_Model_Parameter class specifies the name and value (numeric) parameters needed by the pointing model identified by the pointing_model_name attribute in the Pointing_Correction parent class. The meaning of any given parameter is defined by the pointing model.

DD_Class.name: Radial_Flat_Field_Function
DD_Class.definition: The Radial_Flat_Field_Function class pecifies parameters used to generate a synthetic flat field using a simple radial function of the form: r = (x-x_center)^2 + (y-y_center)^2 ; flat_field(x,y) = 1 + r0 + r1*r + r2*r^2 + r3*r^3 . Note that x is in the sample direction of the image, and y is in the line direction. The image is multiplied by this function in order to perform a flat field correction (which is the opposite of Flat_Field_File).

DD_Class.name: Radiometric_Correction
DD_Class.definition: The Radiometric_Correction class is a container for the type and details of the radiometric calibration performed on the product.

DD_Class.name: Reference_Pixel
DD_Class.definition: Describes a Reference Pixel product, which is a set of dark, non-imaging pixels used to monitor electronics. product_flag.

DD_Class.name: Histogram
DD_Class.definition: Describes a Histogram product.

DD_Class.name: Col_Sum
DD_Class.definition: Describes a Column Summation product, which is a single row containing the sum of all pixels in each column of the image.

DD_Class.name: Row_Sum
DD_Class.definition: Describes a Row Summation product, which is a single column containing the sum of all pixels in each row of the image.

DD_Class.name: Sampling
DD_Class.definition: The Sampling class contains attributes and classes related to the sampling, scaling, companding, and compression or reduction in resolution of data.

DD_Class.name: Shutter_Subtraction
DD_Class.definition: The Shutter_Subtraction class specifies attributes describing the removal from the image of the shutter, or fixed-pattern.

DD_Class.name: Special_Point
DD_Class.definition: Defines a special point on the image detector, such as the location in pixel space that a co-boresighted instrument measures.

DD_Class.name: Subframe
DD_Class.definition: The Subframe class describes the position and other optional characteristics of an image subframe, relative to the original image.

DD_Class.name: Thumbnail
DD_Class.definition: Describes a Thumbnail product, which is a greatly reduced resolution version of the image.

DD_Class.name: Video
DD_Class.definition: The Video class contains attributes related to video observations, defined as a regular time series of frames. The class can be used to describe a single frame within the video, or the video as a whole.

DD_Class.name: Spatial_Filter
DD_Class.definition: The Spatial_Filter class specifies what kind of spatial filtering has been done on the image. Spatial filtering looks at the geometry of pixels (e.g. XYZ or range values) rather than their intensity (cf. Image_Filter).

DD_Class.name: Image_Filter
DD_Class.definition: The Image_Filter class specifies what kind of image filtering has been done to the image. Image filtering looks at image intensity rather the geometry of pixels (cf. Spatial_Filter).

DD_Class.name: High_Dynamic_Range
DD_Class.definition: Specifies parameters related to High Dynamic Range processing, which combines multiple exposures of different lengths into a single product with a greater dynamic range than any of the inputs.

DD_Class.name: High_Dynamic_Range_Exposure
DD_Class.definition: Specifies parameters for each individual exposure in an HDR image.

DD_Rule_Statement.rule_message: IMG:error:imaging_child_check: img:Imaging class must contain at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:detector_params_child_check: img:Detector must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:commanded_params_child_check: img:Commanded_Parameters must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:sampling_child_check: img:Sampling must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:frame_child_check: img:Frame must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:subframe_child_check: img:Subframe must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:color_processing_child_check: img:color must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:downsampling_child_check: img:Downsampling must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:exposure_child_check: img:Exposure must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:focus_child_check: img:Focus must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:focus_stack_child_check: img:Focus_Stack must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:video_child_check: img:Video must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:optical_filter_child_check: img:Optical_Filter must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:onboard_compression_child_check: img:Onboard_Compression must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:jpeg_params_child_check: img:JPEG_Parameters must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:loco_params_child_check: img:LOCO_Parameters must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:icer_params_child_check: img:ICER_Parameters must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
IMG:error:inst_state_child_check: img:Instrument_State must have at least 1 attribute or class specified.
In img:Imaging, Local_Internal_Reference.local_reference_type must be equal to 'imaging_parameters_to_image_object'.
IMG:error:icer_comprs_segment_check: img:ICER_Parameters/img:segment_count must match the number of img:Image_Compression_Segment classes.
IMG:error:shutter_subtraction_check: if img:shutter_subtraction_mode = 'Conditional', then img:exposure_duration_threshold_count must exist.
IMG:error:img:color_filter_array_state_check: img:color_filter_array_state must be equal to one of the following values: 'Encoded', 'Decoded', 'No CFA'.
In img:Optical_Filter, Local_Internal_Reference.local_reference_type must be equal to 'data_to_optical_filter'.
In img:Brightness_Correction_Image, Internal_Reference.reference_type must be equal to 'data_to_brightness_correction'.
In img:Detector, Internal_Reference.reference_type must be equal to 'data_to_raw_source_product'.
In img:High_Dynamic_Range_Exposure, Internal_Reference.reference_type must be equal to 'data_to_raw_source_product'.
